oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Finger Pickin '81 at Cedar Hill Bluegrass Park
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: festivals; Bluegrass music; Scruggs, Earl; Hartford, John; Wiseman, Mac; The Dillard's (Musical group); Jim and Jesse; Cooper, Wilma Lee, 1921-2011;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing the Finger Picking '81 show with Earl Scruggs, John Hartford, Mac Wiseman, the Dillard's, Jim and Jesse, Wilma Lee Cooper and others at the Cedar Hill Bluegrass Park on June 5-6. Poster features metal photoplates of Earl Scruggs, John Hartford, Mac Wiseman, the Dillard's, Jim and Jesse and Wilma Lee Cooper.
